alert.note: Alert for Humphreys; Sharkey; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 2:56PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Holmes, northwestern Yazoo, Humphreys and southeastern Sharkey Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 256 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Onward, or 9 miles north of Valley Park, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Holly Bluff around 310 PM CDT. Midnight around 330 PM CDT. Belzoni around 345 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Silver City and Louise. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central, north central and west central Mississippi.
